overview: Men's Video Magazine hosted by Marilyn Chambers features softcore erotic vignettes, nude disco dancing, topless car washes, a school for strippers, celebrity nude Koo Stark, profiles on Ugly George and the sex lives of the elderly and much more. This, the U.S. version that originally aired on the Playboy Channel in 1983, and the UK version of Electric Blue 001 (hosted by Fiona Richmond and released in 1980) are entirely different. This release shares footage with numerous earlier UK Electric Blue releases but features exclusive footage as well.
title: Electric Blue 001
